people_also_ask.question: Is Doom Eternal Doom 2?
people_also_ask.heading: The sequel to Doom (2016), and the fifth main game in the Doom series, it was released on March 20, 2020, for Windows, PlayStation 4, Stadia and Xbox One, with a version for Nintendo Switch being released on December 8, 2020 and versions for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and Series S being released on June 29, 2021.The sequel to Doom (2016), and the fifth main game in the Doom seriesDoom seriesDoom (stylized as DooM, and later DOOM) is a video game series and media franchise created by John Carmack, John Romero, Adrian Carmack, Kevin Cloud, and Tom Hall.https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Doom_(franchise)Doom (franchise) - Wikipedia, it was released on March 20, 2020, for Windows, PlayStation 4PlayStation 4The graphics processing unit (GPU) is AMD's GPGPU-capable Radeon GCN architecture, consisting of 18 compute units (CUs) for a total of 1,152 cores (64 cores per CU), that produces a theoretical peak performance of 1.84 TFLOPS.https://en.wikipedia.org › PlayStation_4_technical_specificationsPlayStation 4 technical specifications - Wikipedia, Stadia and Xbox One, with a version for Nintendo Switch being released on December 8, 2020 and versions for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and Series SXbox Series X and Series SThe Xbox Series X has higher end hardware, and supports higher display resolutions (up to 8K resolution) along with higher frame rates and real-time ray tracing; it also has a high-speed solid-state drive to reduce loading times.https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Xbox_Series_X_and_Series_SXbox Series X and Series S - Wikipedia being released on June 29, 2021.
people_also_ask.title: Doom Eternal - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Will there be doom 2?
people_also_ask.heading: Results. Doom 2: Hell on Earth was permanently cancelled. Universal hit the reset button and released Doom: Annihilation in 2019.

knowledge_panel.description: doom ii, also known as doom ii: hell on earth, is a first-person shooter game by id software. it was originally released for ms-dos computers in 1994 and macintosh computers in 1995. unlike the original doom, which was initially only available through shareware and mail order, doom ii was sold in stores. wikipedia
